meanings.sent1: The book had large print, making it very readable for me.
meanings.sent2: The article was so readable that I finished it in one sitting.
meanings.sent3: I found the menu very readable, but my friend struggled with it.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so neat and readable, it looked like a printed font.
meanings.sent5: The street signs were clear and readable, helping us navigate easily.

meanings.sent1: The story was so engaging and readable that I couldn't put it down.
meanings.sent2: The font size and spacing made the text very readable for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The joke book was full of readable puns that made us laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her expression was so readable, I could tell she was excited even from afar.
meanings.sent5: The instructions were clear and readable, making the task simple to complete.
